item.title: Inspecting Kubernetes Theoritically
item.description: Kubernetes Kubernetes only understands pods not containers. Pod Creation Requests Bare pod RelplicaSet Deployment Multi Container Pods Share access to memory space Connect to each other using localhost Share access to the same volumes (storage abstraction) Tightly coupled. One crashes, all crashes. Same parameters such as config maps. Pod Atomic Unit in Kubernetes is Pod In a pod either all conatiners or none of them run.
